TopicTitle: Why kerbal engineer redux is not compatible with 1.11 and when will it update?

Articles.Content: Please let me know if you know why the Kerbal engineer is late for the new update (1.11.0). Also, when I enter curse.com, the kerbal engineer says "this project is abandoned". If there is a mod like kerbal engineer please help me. Thank you.

Modders do their work in their own time, for no pay and little thanks.   They update their mods when they can.  

Please check the mod thread itself for info regarding your question, but it appears to be actively worked on:
